article:
Mr. Smith is a good teacher. He teaches English very well. He is _ to his students, so they like him a lot. There are fifty students in  _  class. Mr. Smith always  _  English in class. He and his students are  good  friends, too.
Now some of the students  are playing  on the playground. Bill and Mike  are running . Tom and John are jumping. Mary and Lucy are  _  a kite. Are Lily and Maria flying a kite,  _ ? No, they are playing  games . What's Mr. Smith doing? Look! He is also playing  _ them. How happy they are!
